briefTitle: Different Volumes of Erector Spinae Plane Block for Breast Surgery
officialTitle: Erector Spinae Plane Block in Different Volumes on Postoperative Pain Control Following Breast Surgery: A Randomized, Prospective Study
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast Neoplasms, Breast Diseases
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Postoperative opioid consumption (need and demand as microgram)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) classification I-II
* Scheduled for mastectomy and axillary dissection surgery under general anesthesia

Exclusion Criteria:

* anticoagulant treatment,
* known local anesthetic allergy,
* infected skin around the block site,
* pregnancy or breast-feeding,
* back abnormalities
